name: Pocket Monsters: Pikachu
description: You've finally been granted your Pokémon trainer's license, and now you're on your way to becoming the world's greatest Pokémon trainer!The shockingly cute Pikachu tags along behind you as you search the enormous world for monsters to train and evolve.Face off against Blastoise's torrential water gun.Stand strong when facing Pidgeot's stormy gust.Develop the ultimate Pokémon strategy to defeat the eight GYM leaders and become the greatest Pokémon master of all time!
